description: Try our easy to follow Reuben Sandwich With Allied Mills Seeds & Grains Pane Di Casa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Reuben sandwich,High protein,Sandwich press,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar
name: Reuben Sandwich With Allied Mills Seeds & Grains Pane Di Casa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slice seeds & grain pane di casa

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mayonnaise and hot chilli sauce. Alternatively, use traditional Russian dressing. Spread over one side of each bread slice.
Top two of the slices with sauerkraut, pastrami and cheese. Top with remaining bread slices. Press down firmly.

Heat a nonstick frying pan over a medium low heat. Spread outside of sandwiches with butter. Place in frying pan and cook on each side until cheese melts and filling is warm. Alternatively, use a sandwich press and toast until golden brown.
